## Bowl Season!

Its one of the best times of the year.  In order to celebrate (and to participate in a little competition), I put together a Shiny App to track my collegues picks over the season.  Its improved throughout the season, and there are still improvment's I'd like to add - but below is a working prototype.  

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE} 
knitr::include_app("https://dustyturner.shinyapps.io/bowlseason/", height = "600px")
```
</center>
